com.sadakatsu.clue.ai

Class RandomAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sadakatsu.clue.ai.SpeedClueAI
      • com.sadakatsu.clue.ai.RandomAI

  • public class RandomAI
extends SpeedClueAI
    RandomAI is an AI that randomly makes Suggestions with no duplicates. It does not use any information other than the last Suggestion it made and whether that Suggestion was disproved. When asked to make an accusation, it will only raise the last Suggestion it made as an accusation if that Suggestion was not disproved and if it does not hold any of the cards in its Suggestion in its hand.
    Author:
    Joseph A. Craig

      • RandomAI

        public RandomAI(java.lang.String identifier,
        int serverPort,
        boolean logMessages)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Instantiates a RandomAI connected to a localhost Speed Clue server.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier for this RandomAI instance assigned by the server.
        serverPort - The port number with which this RandomAI should correspond.
        logMessages - Whether this instance should write the messages it receives and sends to stdout and report any message problems to stderr.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • processAccusation

        protected void processAccusation(int accuser,
                     Suggestion accusation,
                     boolean correct)
        Description copied from class: SpeedClueAI
        Performs any player-specific processing related to the passed accusation. If the accusation ends the game (inGame() == false), this method also cleans up any subclass game-specific instance data.
        Specified by:
        processAccusation in class SpeedClueAI
        Parameters:
        accuser - The index of the player who made the accusation.
        accusation - The accusation the player made.
        correct - Whether the accusation matches the solution (true) or not (false).

      • processSuggestion

        protected void processSuggestion(int suggester,
                     Suggestion suggestion,
                     java.lang.Integer disprover,
                     Card shown)
        Description copied from class: SpeedClueAI
        Performs any player-specific processing related to the passed Suggestion.
        Specified by:
        processSuggestion in class SpeedClueAI
        Parameters:
        suggester - The index of the player who made the Suggestion.
        suggestion - The Suggestion that was made.
        disprover - The index of the player that disproved the Suggestion, or null if the Suggestion was not disproved.
        shown - If either this player is neither the suggester nor the disprover, or the Suggestion was not disproved, this argument is null. Otherwise, this argument holds the Card that was shown.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        "java -jar randomAI.jar identifier serverPortNumber [logMessages]"
        Parameters:
        args - - identifier: a unique name to identify the AI - serverPortNumber: the port the server will use to send and receive messages - logMessages: whether the AI should report messages on stdout and stderr
